Package com.mhealthatlas.enterpriseapps.command

Interface IPortfolioCommandService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PortfolioCommandService
public interface IPortfolioCommandService
Contains methods to mutate the portfolio, portfolio class and portfolio class application data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolio​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Deletes an existing enterprise portfolio.
    java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Deletes an existing portfolio class.
    java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolioClassApplication​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.Long applicationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Deletes a mHealthAtlas application from a portfolio class
    java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertPortfolio​(PortfolioCommandDto portfolio, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Inserts a new portfolio for a given enterprise.
    java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertPortfolioClass​(InsertPortfolioClassDto portfolioClass, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Inserts a new portfolio class for a given enterprise.
    java.lang.Boolean insertPortfolioClassApplication​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.Long applicationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Inserts a mHealthAtlas application in a portfolio class
    java.lang.Boolean updatePortfolio​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, PortfolioCommandDto portfolio, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Updates an existing portfolio for a given enterprise.
    java.lang.Boolean updatePortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, UpdatePortfolioClassDto portfolioClass, java.lang.String enterprise)
    Updates an existing portfolio class for a given enterprise.

  • Method Details

    • insertPortfolio

      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertPortfolio​(PortfolioCommandDto portfolio, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Inserts a new portfolio for a given enterprise.
      Parameters:
      portfolio - the portfolio data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the portfolio id, if the creation of the new portfolio was successful;
      an emptyOptional otherwise;

    • updatePortfolio

      java.lang.Boolean updatePortfolio​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, PortfolioCommandDto portfolio, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Updates an existing portfolio for a given enterprise.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the existing portfolio id
      portfolio - the new portfolio data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the portfolio was successfully updated;
      False otherwise;

    • deletePortfolio

      java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolio​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Deletes an existing enterprise portfolio.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the portfolio was successfully deleted;
      False otherwise;

    • insertPortfolioClass

      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Long> insertPortfolioClass​(InsertPortfolioClassDto portfolioClass, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Inserts a new portfolio class for a given enterprise.

      It is validated that the portfolio structure contains no cycle.

      Parameters:
      portfolioClass - the portfolio class data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      the portfolio class id, if the creation of the new portfolio class was successful;
      an emptyOptional otherwise;

    • updatePortfolioClass

      java.lang.Boolean updatePortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, UpdatePortfolioClassDto portfolioClass, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Updates an existing portfolio class for a given enterprise.

      It is validated that the portfolio structure contains no cycle.

      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the existing portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the existing portfolio class id
      portfolioClass - the new portfolio class data
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the portfolio class was successfully updated;
      False otherwise;

    • deletePortfolioClass

      java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolioClass​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Deletes an existing portfolio class.
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the portfolio class was successfully deleted;
      False otherwise;

    • insertPortfolioClassApplication

      java.lang.Boolean insertPortfolioClassApplication​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.Long applicationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Inserts a mHealthAtlas application in a portfolio class
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id
      applicationId - the application id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the mHealthAtlas application was successfully inserted in the portfolio class;
      False otherwise;

    • deletePortfolioClassApplication

      java.lang.Boolean deletePortfolioClassApplication​(java.lang.Long portfolioId, java.lang.Long portfolioClassId, java.lang.Long applicationId, java.lang.String enterprise)
      Deletes a mHealthAtlas application from a portfolio class
      Parameters:
      portfolioId - the portfolio id
      portfolioClassId - the portfolio class id
      applicationId - the application id
      enterprise - the enterprise name
      Returns:
      True if the mHealthAtlas application was successfully deleted from the portfolio class;
      False otherwise;
